description.narrative: UNICEF and partners utilize effective Communication for Development (C4D) guidance and tools to increase demand and foster social and behaviour change in the interests of children., which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Children With Disabilities, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Immunization, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children and to reduce the environmental footprint

REPUBLICAN CENTER OF HEALTH PROMOTI AND MASS COMMUNICATION OF THE MINIS OF HEALTH OF KYRGYZ REPUBLIC

sector.narrative: Adolescents participating in or leading civic engagement initiatives (including in humanitarian settings)

Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF and partners utilize effective C4D guidance and tools to increase demand and foster social and behaviour change in the interests of children.

description.narrative: UNICEF continued to combat vaccination hesitancy, training more than 1,000 health staff in interpersonal communication, obtaining the commitment of religious leaders to promote immunization, supporting the Ministry of Health in overhauling the immunization web-portal, and supporting CSOs in social mobilization and community engagement. This resulted in the vaccination of 8% of under-vaccinated children in the targeted areas. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:06/12/2019

title.narrative: C4D Roadmap on Child Marriage endorsed by relevant ministries and implementation launched

target.value: 2020:C4D Roadmap on Child Marriage approved by the relevant state institutions

title.narrative: Generation and use of social, behavioural and communication data and evidence meets quality standards for informing and monitoring C4D strategies in Country Programme priorities
Budgeting for C4D Strategies meets quality standards
